automatic_backup_failed_create.title: Automatic backup could not be created
automatic_backup_failed_create.description: The automatic backup could not be created. Please check the logs for more information. Another attempt will be made at the next scheduled time if a backup schedule is configured.

automatic_backup_failed_upload_agents.title: Automatic backup could not be uploaded to agents
automatic_backup_failed_upload_agents.description: The automatic backup could not be uploaded to agents {failed_agents}. Please check the logs for more information. Another attempt will be made at the next scheduled time if a backup schedule is configured.
